TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleMonthSpan extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable

Docs.summary: Represents a time interval in months and corresponds to the Oracle 9i data type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Oracle `INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH` data type (Oracle 9i or later) contains an interval of time in years and months, and has a fixed size of 5 bytes.
To obtain an OracleMonthSpan object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleMonthSpan%2A> method.

Return Value
Condition
Less than zero

Zero

Greater than zero
